projects.title: CrossFit Throwdown
projects.description: Cross-platform mobile application built with React-Native and Firebase that assists CrossFit Yuma in their annual Throwdown competition.

projects.title: Korean Translation Bot
projects.description: Currently translating the messages of over 2500 people... This application was built with NodeJS, Facebook Messenger API, and the Naver Translate API.

projects.title: Stock Helper
projects.description: Cross-platform mobile application built with MeteorJS that eases the burden of having to remember the formula and then correctly calculate the price-earnings-ratio of a particular stock

howTo.title: Run: `npm i` to install the dependencies
